app_descript:
App Name: Kiss

App Package Name: com.stardust.kissreader

Brief:

Immerse yourself in a world of love and intrigue with KISS, where romance of every shade awaits to satisfy your every mood. Whether it's the thrill of suspense, the burning passion of hot fantasy, or the joy of LGBTQ stories, with KISS, you can indulge in free chapters from renowned authors daily and keep your romance reading fresh and exciting.
